meanings.definition: Swelling or sticking out in a rounded shape
meanings.sent1: The bulging balloon was ready to pop.
meanings.sent2: Her bulging cheeks showed she had eaten too much candy.
meanings.sent3: The bulging pillow looked like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The bulging clouds signaled an incoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The bulging eyes of the surprised cat were comical.

meanings.sent1: The river began bulging after heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: His wallet was bulging with money after payday.
meanings.sent3: The balloon started bulging as it filled with air.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was bulging with happiness on her wedding day.
meanings.sent5: The tree roots bulging out of the ground looked like nature's art.

meanings.sent1: The bulging on the tire indicated it needed air.
meanings.sent2: He noticed a bulging in the wall where the hidden door was.
meanings.sent3: The bulging in his pocket turned out to be a forgotten snack.
meanings.sent4: The bulging of the volcano hinted at an imminent eruption.
meanings.sent5: The bulging of the backpack revealed it was overstuffed.
